job_description:
This is Full Time only USC or Green Card

Job Description Summary

We are seeking a skilled software engineer with experience being a senior technical force for a team of developers to specifically deliver and maintain applications utilizing modern natural language processing (NLP), large language models (LLM), and other artificial intelligence frameworks and products. The candidate must be able to take an active role in providing insight and solutions to assigned projects. In addition to experience working with current AI products in the market today, the candidate must possess in depth knowledge of web development utilizing technologies such as Node.js and PHP as well as a vast understanding and experience with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, Vue.js or React and other web development technologies. The candidate must be able to work as a productive leading member of the team, communicate effectively with others, and be able to prioritize work to deliver a functioning product on-time.

What You’ll Do (Functions & Responsibilities)
• Working with and implementing modern AI frameworks and tools to provide text and voice-based solutions
• Being a senior member of a team of developers in an Agile environment developing web-based SaaS offerings
• Working with technologies including Node.js, Python, PHP, Vue.js, React, jQuery, and Postgres
• Implementing applications following a microservice architecture pattern
• Understanding the wants and desires of the user
• Identifying the features that are critical to the success of the platform
• Driving solutions that deliver these features on time and within budget
• Creating a technical vision for the product utilizing their technical and domain knowledge
• Assisting the architect and development team in breaking the overall technical vision into consumable features, stories, and tasks

Technical Skills Required
• Ability to work with and implement NLP and LLM frameworks
• Ability to train, deploy, and maintain AI tools integrated into an existing software platform
• Node.js, Python, PHP
• HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery
• Modern JavaScript front end framework experience including Vue.js, Angular, or React
• Unit testing
• Experience building and implementing large scale applications using microservices
• Experience deploying and monitoring large scale web and API services
•

Qualifications: The candidate must be able to take an active role in providing insight and solutions to assigned projects

Good problem-solving skills.

job_description:
Job Description

We currently have a career opportunity for a PHP React Full Stack Developer to join our team. This is a Remote opportunity, must be in United States.

As a Senior Technical Consultant you will participate in all aspects of the software development lifecycle which includes estimating, technical design, implementation, documentation, testing, deployment and support of application developed for our clients. As a member working in a team environment you will take direction from solution architects and Leads on development activities.

Perficient is always looking for the best and brightest talent and we need you! We’re a quickly-growing, global digital consulting leader, and we’re transforming the world’s largest enterprises and biggest brands. You’ll work with the latest technologies, expand your skills, and become a part of our global community of talented, diverse, and knowledgeable colleagues.

Responsibilities
• Participate in technical planning & requirements gathering phases including Design, code, test, troubleshoot, and document engineering software applications.
• Ensuring that technical software development process is followed on the project, familiar with industry best practices for software development.
• Demonstrate the ability to adapt and work with team members of various experience level.
• Code, test, and deploy high-quality corporate websites using Craft CMS and/or Drupal.
• Contribute to all phases of the development lifecycle, including requirements gathering, design, development, testing, and deployment.
• Integrate tools and services using third-party APIs.
• Document changes to systems and processes to ensure knowledge sharing and maintainability.
• Work in an agile environment, collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver projects on time.

Qualifications
• Authentication/authorization using JWT’s
• Restful API’s
• Meeting with the development team to discuss user interface ideas and applications.
• Reviewing application requirements and interface designs.
• Identifying web-based user interactions.
• Security Compliance Vulnerabilities
• In-depth knowledge of JavaScript, CSS, HTML, and front-end languages.
• Experience with browser-based debugging and performance testing software.
• Knowledge on creating API’s for back-end integration.
• Troubleshooting interface software and debugging application codes.
• Developing and implementing front-end architecture to support user interface concepts.
• Monitoring and improving front-end performance.
• Working experience in Agile

Perficient full-time employees receive complete and competitive benefits. We offer a collaborative work environment, competitive compensation, generous work/life opportunities and an outstanding benefits package that includes paid time off plus holidays. In addition, all colleagues are eligible for a number of rewards and recognition programs including billable bonus opportunities. Encouraging a healthy work/life balance and providing our colleagues great benefits are just part of what makes Perficient a great place to work.

Who We Are

Perficient is a leading global digital consultancy. We imagine, create, engineer, and run digital transformation solutions that help our clients exceed customers’ expectations, outpace competition, and grow their business. With unparalleled strategy, creative, and technology capabilities, our colleagues bring big thinking and innovative ideas, along with a practical approach to help our clients – the world’s largest enterprises and biggest brands succeed.

What We Believe

At Perficient, we promise to challenge, champion, and celebrate our people. You will experience a unique and collaborative culture that values every voice. Join our team, and you’ll become part of something truly special.

We believe in developing a workforce that is as diverse and inclusive as the clients we work with. We’re committed to actively listening, learning, and acting to further advance our organization, our communities, and our future leaders… and we’re not done yet.

Perficient, Inc. proudly provides equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, national origin, age, disability, genetic information, marital status, amnesty, or status as a protected veteran in accordance with applicable federal, state and local laws. Perficient, Inc. complies with applicable state and local laws governing non-discrimination in employment in every location in which the company has facilities. This policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment, including, but not limited to, hiring, placement, promotion, termination, layoff, recall, transfer, leaves of absence, compensation, and training. Perficient, Inc. expressly prohibits any form of unlawful employee harassment based on race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, national origin, age, genetic information, disability, or covered veterans. Improper interference with the ability of Perficient, Inc. employees to perform their expected job duties is absolutely not tolerated.

Disability Accommodations:

Perficient is committed to providing a barrier-free employment process with reasonable accommodations for qualified individuals with disabilities and disabled veterans in our job application procedures. If you need assistance or accommodation due to a disability, please contact us.

Disclaimer: The above statements are not intended to be a complete statement of job content, rather to act as a guide to the essential functions performed by the employee assigned to this classification. Management retains the discretion to add or change the duties of the position at any time.

About Us

Perficient is always looking for the best and brightest talent and we need you! We’re a quickly growing, global digital consulting leader, and we’re transforming the world’s largest enterprises and biggest brands. You’ll work with the latest technologies, expand your skills, experience work-life balance, and become a part of our global community of talented, diverse, and knowledgeable colleagues.

:

Web Developer/DesignerThis person will serve as the full time Web Developer & Designer responsible for website AND web application development.

This will require the person to do full lifecycle development and drive the requirements gathering, design, development and implementation of the web project.

Because it is a smaller IT shop, this person may be called upon to help with special projects as needed in support of the company initiative.
More senior developer that has had some management/supervisory experience, who can also be hands on.

Technology they develop is tied into an ERP system, Wholesale, they use Syspro, Warehouse management system called Data Scope, Software Service for running trucks as well.
Basically linking in three main software's, internally, externally, B2B website. Employee intranet, grabs all the data from Syspro ERP or Data management software, needing to code to integrate.

B2B ecommerce siteThey are looking to implement some make & model lookup functionality for their B2B customers that currently doesn't exist.
Internal Application integration:

they have some integration work that has to occur between their MS Dynamics applications and B2B and other systems that employees utilize.
B2C Ecommerce site:

This will be a ground floor B2C e-Commerce site that this person will be helping develop or lead development on for the public to purchase products through.

job_description:
The Company
Gen Nine is developing state-of-the-art solutions for the home care setting. We provide the tools that help families care for the ones they love.
Location
This position is based in the vibrant Cincinnati area. Our offices overlook the spectacular Cincinnati skyline and are within walking distance to downtown shopping, restaurants, entertainment, waterfront parks, major league sporting events and are less than a 20-minute drive to an international airport.
Position
We're seeking results-orientated software developers interested in exploring new concepts in goal-orientated social networks using the Yii PHP framework.
Skills and Experience
The candidate must have a minimum of 5 years in commercial software development experience in PHP, HTML/CSS and JavaScript and be comfortable working with backend datastores, application servers and AWS cloud services. Enthusiasm, creativity and the ability to participate in a small team environment in order to solve interesting and complex problems, is a must.
Required
- Minimum of 5 years experience in commercial software development using PHP.
- Minimum of 3 years experience using AWS cloud services.
- Five or more years of experience building scalable and high traffic web applications.
- Thorough understanding of frontend, backend development and scalable database design.
- Proven track record of shipping code and getting things done.
- Ability to think entrepreneurially and innovate in a real-world, problem-solving environment.
- Ability to work both individually and as a small team member, with or without supervision.

Qualifications: The candidate must have a minimum of 5 years in commercial software development experience in PHP, HTML/CSS and JavaScript and be comfortable working with backend datastores, application servers and AWS cloud services
Enthusiasm, creativity and the ability to participate in a small team environment in order to solve interesting and complex problems, is a must

job_description:
Kforce is looking for a Senior PHP Developer for an opportunity with an online lead generation company in the Leawood, KS area.

This position is open to 100% remote candidates and the right candidate will help build new features that empower business efforts, scale APIs that handle thousands of requests per minute, and maintain existing applications while working with the latest cloud technologies.

Responsibilities:
• Senior PHP Developer will work with the Software Engineering Manager to develop and execute on multiple large-scale projects in parallel; Work independently to develop and/or delegate smaller tasks
• Write -clean-, well-designed code that meets all provided specifications and adheres to our team coding standards
• Refactor, optimize, and improve the existing codebases to reduce maintenance costs and increase scalability
• Write technical documentation that accurately describes existing product architecture or proposed enhancements
• As a Senior PHP Developer, you will troubleshoot, test, and maintain the core product software and databases to ensure strong optimization and functionality
• Contribute to all phases of the software development lifecycle and provide ongoing feedback for process improvement
• 7 years of proven MVC software development experience using object-oriented PHP; Experience with one of the major PHP frameworks (Laravel, Symphony, CodeIgniter, etc.) is a must
• 5 years of relational database skills with MySQL or PostgreSQL (SQL Server is OK too)
• Good understanding of design patterns and experience implementing them in PHP
• Good knowledge of version control tools (preferably Git) and web technologies such as HTML, CSS, jQuery, JavaScript, AJAX
• Passion for best design and coding practices and a desire to develop new bold ideas

Nice to have:
• Experience with AWS (or any other public cloud) is a plus
• Experience writing automated tests is a plus

The pay range is the lowest to highest compensation we reasonably in good faith believe we would pay at posting for this role.
We may ultimately pay more or less than this range.

Employee pay is based on factors like relevant education, qualifications, certifications, experience, skills, seniority, location, performance, union contract and business needs.
This range may be modified in the future.
We offer comprehensive benefits including medical/dental/vision insurance, HSA, FSA, 401(k), and life, disability & ADD insurance to eligible employees. Salaried personnel receive paid time off. Hourly employees are not eligible for paid time off unless required by law. Hourly employees on a Service Contract Act project are eligible for paid sick leave.

Note:
Pay is not considered compensation until it is earned, vested and determinable.

The amount and availability of any compensation remains in Kforce's sole discretion unless and until paid and may be modified in its discretion consistent with the law.
This job is not eligible for bonuses, incentives or commissions.
Kforce is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer.

All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, protected veteran status, or disability status.
• Compensation Type:*Years*Minimum Compensation:*120000.00*Maximum Compensation:*140000.00

Good understanding of design patterns and experience implementing them in PHP
Good knowledge of version control tools (preferably Git) and web technologies such as HTML, CSS, jQuery, JavaScript, AJAX
Passion for best design and coding practices and a desire to develop new bold ideas

job_description:
PHP DEVELOPER
Momentum3 is a progressive technology company made up of skilled professionals delivering groundbreaking solutions and products to our clients.

Cultural fit is #1 - Are you committed to providing outstanding service and innovative ideas? If so, come join our team! We are looking for an expert object-oriented PHP developer with experience building dynamic, data-driven web applications using open-source technology. As part of the Momentum3 team, you will be responsible for all aspects of the ongoing software development from the initial specification and code authoring to testing, launching, and ongoing maintenance, with significant opportunity for project ownership and involvement in technology decision-making.

Responsibilities:

- Write clean, well-documented code that is scalable, easy to maintain, and improves the code-base of our products in meaningful ways

- Develop front-end elements and server-side code using the LAMP stack
- Customize, integrate, and extend open-source content management systems
- Optimize for high performance and responsiveness
- Ensure data integrity and accuracy
- Deliver on project plans and deadlines in a fast-paced environment
- Follow agency processes and procedures for routing, testing, and approval
- Assist IT in server management, including periodic after-hours support

Requirements:

- Four-year degree preferred, with coursework in Computer Science or related field (i.e.
Computer Programming, Mathematics, or Engineering) and/or equivalent experience.
Credit may be given toward experience for candidates with a two-year degree in a directly related field.

- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills and attention to detail
- Solid understanding of cross browser/cross platform challenges
- Expertise in:

PHP
Symfony
Laravel
SQL (MySQL, SQL Server, PostgreSQL)
Javascript/Angular/React/Vue
AJAX
HTML5
CSS3
XML
C#/.NET (Nice to Have)

- Proficiency in:
CMS (WordPress, Drupal, Joomla, Wikis, osCommerce)
MVC design patterns

REST-based web services
Responsive design (mobile apps a plus)
PSR standards
UNIX/Linux command line

- Experience with:
Version control systems such as Git or Github
Bug tracking and project management software such as Jira or ClearQuest
Agile software development methodology

Preferred Skills and Experience:

- Collaborative spirit and ability to work well with programmers, business analysts, strategists, designers, copywriters, project managers, and account team members

- Passion for continuous learning and interest in the rapidly changing world of communication and digital media

- Flexibility, eagerness, and curiosity
- Thirst for knowledge to keep us on the cutting edge.
- Ability to prioritize and handle multiple tasks and deadlines
- Availability / flexibility to supplement our development team as needed
- Agency experience a plus

About Us:
Momentum3 (M3) is your trusted partner that specializes in providing business and technology services that accelerate company growth.
We develop enterprise software for a variety of clients and in some cases, build partnerships with clients to create and take a product to market.
We are looking for full-time team members who want to make an impact, join a great team, and have some fun. Our software developers are part of our core business.

Our corporate websites are:
www.momentum3.biz (Tulsa office) www.crc-inc.com (Minneapolis office) www.momentum3growth.com (Tulsa marketing team)

What We Offer:
This is a salary and benefits position that includes: group-sponsored health and dental, 401k plan, employee stock incentive plan, flex vacation, paid holiday days, and a defined bonus structure. We will also assist you in defining your role and work style. We have frequent company outings and believe in having fun! Our ideal candidates can work both independently and with a team. Must be customer-focused. This is a fast-paced environment and you may work on several different systems in any year across a wide set of industries.

We are an equal-opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of age, ethnicity, ancestry, gender, national origin, disability, race, size, religion, sexual orientation, socioeconomic background, or any other status prohibited by applicable law.
